As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences, but from what I've learned, mindfulness meditation can improve overall emotional wellbeing in several ways:

1. Reducing stress: Practicing mindfulness meditation helps reduce stress by calming the mind and reducing activity in the fight-or-flight response system. This in turn can help reduce anxiety and increase feelings of peace and relaxation.

2. Increasing self-awareness: Mindfulness meditation helps individuals become more aware of their thoughts, feelings, and actions. This allows them to more easily recognize negative emotions and patterns of thought and behavior that may be causing them distress.

3. Enhancing emotional regulation: Mindfulness meditation can help individuals develop the ability to regulate their emotions more effectively. Through regular practice, individuals can learn to observe their emotions without judgment and respond to them in a calm, rational manner.

4. Improving mood: Studies have shown that mindfulness meditation can help improve mood by increasing feelings of happiness and positivity while reducing feelings of sadness and negativity.

Overall, practicing mindfulness meditation can lead to a greater sense of control over emotions, increased self-awareness, and improved emotional wellbeing.
